{% set recipe = { title: "Popcorn Trail mix", img: "popcorn-trail-mix.jpg", preptime: "5 mins", preptimeschema: "5M", prepadd: "", cooktime: " ", cooktimeschema: "M", cookadd: "", difficulty: "Easy", serves: "about 7 cups", ctaurl: "", today : "01/09/2019", description: "", keywords: "", cuisine : "Australian" } %} {% set category = { name: 'Lunchbox Ideas', uri: '/inspireandcreate/lunchboxideas' } %} {% block ingridients %}
  • 3 x 23g pkts Arnott’s Jatz Original Minis biscuits*
  • 1 cup (80g) banana chips
  • 1 cup (50g) pretzels
  • 1 cup (45g) mini marshmallows
  • 1 cup (45g) Uncle Tobys Cheerios
  • 1 cup (15g) sweet and saltypopcorn
  • ½ cup (65g) dried cranberries
  • ½ cup (80g) sultanas
    • {% endblock %} {% block method %}
    1. Combine the biscuits, banana chips, pretzels, marshmallows, Cheerios, popcorn, cranberries and sultanas in a large bowl. Store in an airtight container for up to 2 weeks.
    {% endblock %} {% set nutri = false %} {% block nutriblock %}

    NUTRITION INFORMATION (per ½ cup)
    Energy 487kJ Cals 117 Protein 2g Fat 2g Sat Fat 1g Sodium 91mg Carb 22g Sugar 10g Dietary Fibre 2g

    {% endblock %}
